address.description: Address of the host; could be the same as the host's name

network_zone.description: Which network zone does the host belong to? (e.g. Test, Production, Management, Development)

checks_to_execute.description: Comma-separated list of checks you wish to execute (shown in available checks table); be sure to wrap in double quotes

process_names.description: Names of processes you want to specifically check for if you include the is_process_running check in your checks_to_execute_field

http_vhosts.description: comma-separated list of virtual hosts running on the Host (e.g. the ServerName value of each VHost)

env.description: Environment in which Host lives (e.g. Echo, Drake, etc.)

disable_notifications.description: 0 or 1 representing whether or not to disable notifications for this host; if not included, notifications will be enabled

disable_wmi.description: Only matters for Windows machines, will not affect Linux; 0 or 1 representing whether or not to disable WMI checks for Host; if not included, notifications will be enabled

disable_ssh.description: Only matters for Linux machines, will not affect Windows; 0 or 1 representing whether or not to disable SSH-based checks on Host; if not included, notifications will be enabled

datacenter.description: Name of datacenter to which the Host belongs

cluster.description: Name of cluster to which the Host belongs

ncpa.description: Whether or not to use NCPA agent-based check
